title: Jay Shetty - How to Think Like a Monk
itunes:title: Jay Shetty - How to Think Like a Monk
description:
Jay Shetty has over 37 million followers online, 7 billion video views and was a monk for 3 years in India. In his new book, Think Like a Monk, he teaches you how to train your mind for peace and purpose. I have known Jay for 3 years now and he is one of the most incredible people I know. If you're looking for more peace and happiness in your life, this episode is for you!

To join my motivational text group text me now at +𝟏-𝟓𝟏𝟐-𝟓𝟖𝟎-𝟗𝟑𝟎𝟓

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
